name: Neiman Marcus Cake
author: Donna Menz
instructions: Mix cake mix, 2 eggs, oleo and nuts together and spread on a greased 9 x 13 inch pan (will be a stiff dough). Mix 2 eggs, vanilla, cream cheese, and powdered sugar together and spread on top of cake batter and bake at 350Â° for 30 to 35 minutes.
